Title: Subarray Sums II
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to count the number of subarrays having sum x.
Input Specification:
The first input line has two integers n and x: the size of the array and the target sum x. 
 The next line has n integers a_1,a_2,\dots,a_n: the contents of the array.
Output Specification: Print one integer: the required number of subarrays.
